rules_text:
When you cast Chaos create 6 1/1 Black Beast Tokens with Haste.
Nrvnqsr Chaos’s power and toughness are equal to the number of beasts you control.
When Nrvnqsr Chaos dies, sacrifice a beast you control then return Nrvnqsr Chaos to the battlefield.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 Black Beast Token with Haste
